https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/b2EE3sMw32Yke1FgcAkYuOKGqPg.jpg Documentary charting the rise of Chinese art following the death of Mao, and how some artists embraced Western styles while other critiqued it by hijacking communist propaganda. China, One Million Artists
